channel.title: Hey can anyone help me with this command

item.title: Hey can anyone help me with this command
item.dc:creator: @shufflebros shufflebros
item.description:
@shufflebros wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:2, topic:432860”][quote author=shufflebros link=topic=535568.msg3915469#msg3915469 date=1329134695]
Hey can anyone help me with this command because im trying to make a easter bunny command where it turns u into the easter bunny but when i walk with the command on it all goes misplaced but i think it is because of the animations well here it is if u can help me please post below TY

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“bunny”)) {
if (c.playerStandIndex != 11046) {
c.npcId2 = 1835;
c.isNpc = true;
c.playerStandIndex = 11046;
c.playerTurnIndex = 11047;
c.playerWalkIndex = 11047;
c.playerTurn180Index = 11047;
c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 11046;
c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 11046;
c.playerRunIndex = 11047;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“BunnyMode has been activated.”);
} else {
c.isNpc = false;
c.playerStandIndex = 0x328;
c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337;
c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333;
c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334;
c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335;
c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336;
c.playerRunIndex = 0x338;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“BunnyMode has been deactivated.”);
}
}
[/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("bunny")) { if (c.playerStandIndex != 11046) { c.npcId2 = 1835; c.isNpc = true; c.playerStandIndex = 11046; c.playerTurnIndex = 11047; c.playerWalkIndex = 11047; //new animation id c.playerTurn180Index = 11047; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 11046; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 11046; c.playerRunIndex = 11047; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("BunnyMode has been activated."); } else { c.isNpc = false; c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337; c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333; c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336; c.playerRunIndex = 0x338; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("BunnyMode has been deactivated."); } }
If the walking is screwed up you should find the right walking id for the easter bunny.[/quote]

I know but i do not know where to find it can u help me please.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey can anyone help me with this command

item.title: Hey can anyone help me with this command
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“shufflebros, post:1, topic:432860”] Hey can anyone help me with this command because im trying to make a easter bunny command where it turns u into the easter bunny but when i walk with the command on it all goes misplaced but i think it is because of the animations well here it is if u can help me please post below TY

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“bunny”)) {
if (c.playerStandIndex != 11046) {
c.npcId2 = 1835;
c.isNpc = true;
c.playerStandIndex = 11046;
c.playerTurnIndex = 11047;
c.playerWalkIndex = 11047;
c.playerTurn180Index = 11047;
c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 11046;
c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 11046;
c.playerRunIndex = 11047;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“BunnyMode has been activated.”);
} else {
c.isNpc = false;
c.playerStandIndex = 0x328;
c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337;
c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333;
c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334;
c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335;
c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336;
c.playerRunIndex = 0x338;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“BunnyMode has been deactivated.”);
}
}[/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("bunny")) { if (c.playerStandIndex != 11046) { c.npcId2 = 1835; c.isNpc = true; c.playerStandIndex = 11046; c.playerTurnIndex = 11047; c.playerWalkIndex = 11047; //new animation id c.playerTurn180Index = 11047; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 11046; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 11046; c.playerRunIndex = 11047; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("BunnyMode has been activated."); } else { c.isNpc = false; c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337; c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333; c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336; c.playerRunIndex = 0x338; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("BunnyMode has been deactivated."); } }
If the walking is screwed up you should find the right walking id for the easter bunny.

item.title: Hey can anyone help me with this command
item.dc:creator: @shufflebros shufflebros
item.description:
@shufflebros wrote:

                                        Hey can anyone help me with this command because im trying to make a easter bunny command where it turns u into the easter bunny but when i walk with the command on it all goes misplaced but i think it is because of the animations well here it is if u can help me please post below TY

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“bunny”)) {
if (c.playerStandIndex != 11046) {
c.npcId2 = 1835;
c.isNpc = true;
c.playerStandIndex = 11046;
c.playerTurnIndex = 11047;
c.playerWalkIndex = 11047;
c.playerTurn180Index = 11047;
c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 11046;
c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 11046;
c.playerRunIndex = 11047;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“BunnyMode has been activated.”);
} else {
c.isNpc = false;
c.playerStandIndex = 0x328;
c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337;
c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333;
c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334;
c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335;
c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336;
c.playerRunIndex = 0x338;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“BunnyMode has been deactivated.”);
}
}
